pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Friday, May 13, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Yukon, Sandy Silver.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

2:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a plaque unveiling ceremony with Her Royal Highness Princess Margriet of the Netherlands.

Beechwood Cemetery
280 Beechwood Avenue
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 2:15 p.m.
